001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.service.fluent;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.storage.Storage;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.accordion.AccordionComponentType;
005import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.accordion.AccordionService;
006import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.AccordionUiElement;
007import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.smart.SmartWebDriver;
008import io.qameta.allure.Allure;
009import java.util.Arrays;
010import java.util.List;
011import org.assertj.core.api.Assertions;
012
013import static io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.storage.StorageKeysUi.UI;
014
015/**
016 * Provides fluent API methods for interacting with Accordion UI components.
017 *
018 * <p>This class encapsulates interactions with Accordion elements, allowing actions such as expansion,
019 * collapsing, retrieving states, and verifying their properties. It integrates with
020 * {@link AccordionService} to perform operations in a structured manner.
021 *
022 * <p>The generic type {@code T} represents the main UI service fluent class that this service extends,
023 * allowing method chaining within the fluent API structure.
024 *
025 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
026 */
027@SuppressWarnings({"java:S5960", "unchecked"})
028public class AccordionServiceFluent<T extends UiServiceFluent<?>> {
029
030   private static final String VALIDATING_ACCORDIONS = "Validating Accordions";
031   private final AccordionService accordionService;
032   private final T uiServiceFluent;
033   private final Storage storage;
034   private final SmartWebDriver driver;
035
036   /**
037    * Constructs an instance of {@link AccordionServiceFluent}.
038    *
039    * @param uiServiceFluent  The main UI service fluent instance.
040    * @param storage          The storage object for maintaining test state.
041    * @param accordionService The service handling accordion interactions.
042    * @param webDriver        The instance of {@link SmartWebDriver}.
043    */
044   public AccordionServiceFluent(T uiServiceFluent, Storage storage, AccordionService accordionService,
045                                 SmartWebDriver webDriver) {
046      this.accordionService = accordionService;
047      this.uiServiceFluent = uiServiceFluent;
048      this.storage = storage;
049      this.driver = webDriver;
050   }
051
052   /**
053    * Expands the specified accordion panel.
054    *
055    * @param element The accordion UI element to expand.
056    * @return The current fluent service instance for method chaining.
057    */
058   public T expand(final AccordionUiElement element) {
059      Allure.step(String.format("[UI - Accordion] Expanding accordion with componentType: %s, locator: %s",
060            element.componentType(), element.locator()));
061      element.before().accept(driver);
062      accordionService.expand((AccordionComponentType) element.componentType(), element.locator());
063      element.after().accept(driver);
064      return uiServiceFluent;
065   }
066
067   /**
068    * Collapses the specified accordion panel.
069    *
070    * @param element The accordion UI element to collapse.
071    * @return The current fluent service instance for method chaining.
072    */
073   public T collapse(final AccordionUiElement element) {
074      Allure.step(String.format("[UI - Accordion] Collapsing accordion with componentType: %s, locator: %s",
075            element.componentType(), element.locator()));
076      element.before().accept(driver);
077      accordionService.collapse((AccordionComponentType) element.componentType(), element.locator());
078      element.after().accept(driver);
079      return uiServiceFluent;
080   }
081
082   /**
083    * Checks if the specified accordion element is enabled.
084    *
085    * @param element The accordion UI element to check.
086    * @return The current fluent service instance for method chaining.
087    */
088   public T areEnabled(final AccordionUiElement element, String... values) {
089      Allure.step(String.format("[UI - Accordion] Checking if accordion is enabled with componentType: %s, locator: %s",
090            element.componentType(), element.locator()));
091      element.before().accept(driver);
092      boolean enabled = accordionService.areEnabled((AccordionComponentType) element.componentType(), values);
093      element.after().accept(driver);
094      storage.sub(UI).put(element.enumImpl(), enabled);
095      return uiServiceFluent;
096   }
097
098   /**
099    * Validates that the accordion elements are enabled.
100    *
101    * @param element The accordion UI element.
102    * @param values  The values to validate.
103    * @return The current fluent service instance for method chaining.
104    */
105   public T validateAreEnabled(final AccordionUiElement element, final String... values) {
106      Allure.step("[UI - Accordion] Validate if accordions are enabled: " + Arrays.toString(values));
107      return validateAreEnabled(element, true, false, values);
108   }
109
110   /**
111    * Validates that the accordion elements are enabled.
112    *
113    * @param element The accordion UI element.
114    * @param soft    A boolean indicating whether the validation should be performed softly.
115    *                If {@code true}, failures will be collected rather than throwing an exception immediately.
116    * @param values  The values to validate.
117    * @return The current fluent service instance for method chaining.
118    */
119   public T validateAreEnabled(final AccordionUiElement element, boolean soft, final String... values) {
120      Allure.step("[UI - Accordion] Validate if accordions are enabled (soft: " + soft + "): "
121            + Arrays.toString(values));
122      return validateAreEnabled(element, true, soft, values);
123   }
124
125   private T validateAreEnabled(final AccordionUiElement element, boolean shouldBeEnabled, boolean soft,
126                                final String... values) {
127      element.before().accept(driver);
128      boolean enabled = accordionService.areEnabled((AccordionComponentType) element.componentType(), values);
129      element.after().accept(driver);
130      storage.sub(UI).put(element.enumImpl(), enabled);
131
132      String assertionMessage = shouldBeEnabled
133            ? "Validating accordions are enabled"
134            : "Validating accordions are disabled";
135
136      if (soft) {
137         return (T) uiServiceFluent.validate(
138               softAssertions -> {
139                  if (shouldBeEnabled) {
140                     softAssertions.assertThat(enabled).as(assertionMessage).isTrue();
141                  } else {
142                     softAssertions.assertThat(enabled).as(assertionMessage).isFalse();
143                  }
144               }
145         );
146      } else {
147         return (T) uiServiceFluent.validate(
148               () -> {
149                  if (shouldBeEnabled) {
150                     Assertions.assertThat(enabled).as(assertionMessage).isTrue();
151                  } else {
152                     Assertions.assertThat(enabled).as(assertionMessage).isFalse();
153                  }
154               }
155         );
156      }
157   }
158
159   /**
160    * Validates that the accordion elements are disabled.
161    *
162    * @param element The accordion UI element.
163    * @param values  The values to validate.
164    * @return The current fluent service instance for method chaining.
165    */
166   public T validateAreDisabled(final AccordionUiElement element, final String... values) {
167      Allure.step("[UI - Accordion] Validate if accordions are disabled: " + Arrays.toString(values));
168      return validateAreEnabled(element, false, false, values);
169   }
170
171   /**
172    * Validates that the accordion elements are disabled.
173    *
174    * @param element The accordion UI element.
175    * @param soft    A boolean indicating whether the validation should be performed softly.
176    *                If {@code true}, failures will be collected rather than throwing an exception immediately.
177    * @param values  The values to validate.
178    * @return The current fluent service instance for method chaining.
179    */
180   public T validateAreDisabled(final AccordionUiElement element, boolean soft, final String... values) {
181      Allure.step("[UI - Accordion] Validate if accordions are disabled (soft: " + soft + "): "
182            + Arrays.toString(values));
183      return validateAreEnabled(element, false, soft, values);
184   }
185
186   /**
187    * Checks if specified accordion is enabled, using the given accordion component type.
188    *
189    * @param element The accordion UI element.
190    * @return The current fluent service instance for method chaining.
191    */
192   public T isEnabled(final AccordionUiElement element) {
193      Allure.step(String.format("[UI - Accordion] Checking if accordion is enabled with componentType: %s, locator: %s",
194            element.componentType(), element.locator()));
195      element.before().accept(driver);
196      boolean enabled = accordionService.isEnabled(element.componentType(), element.locator());
197      element.after().accept(driver);
198      storage.sub(UI).put(element.enumImpl(), enabled);
199      return uiServiceFluent;
200   }
201
202   /**
203    * Validates that the accordion element is enabled.
204    *
205    * @param element The accordion UI element.
206    * @param value   The value to validate
207    *                * @return The current fluent service instance for method chaining.
208    */
209   public T validateIsEnabled(final AccordionUiElement element, final String value) {
210      Allure.step("[UI - Accordion] Validate that the accordion is enabled");
211      return validateAreEnabled(element, true, false, value);
212   }
213
214   /**
215    * Validates that the accordion element is enabled.
216    *
217    * @param element The accordion UI element.
218    * @param soft    A boolean indicating whether the validation should be performed softly.
219    *                If {@code true}, failures will be collected rather than throwing an exception immediately.
220    * @param value   The value to validate.
221    * @return The current fluent service instance for method chaining.
222    */
223   public T validateIsEnabled(final AccordionUiElement element, boolean soft, final String value) {
224      Allure.step("[UI - Accordion] Validate that the accordion is enabled (soft: " + soft + "): " + value);
225      return validateAreEnabled(element, true, soft, value);
226   }

228   /**
229    * Validates that the accordion element is disabled.
230    *
231    * @param element The accordion UI element.
232    * @param value   The value to validate.
233    * @return The current fluent service instance for method chaining.
234    */
235   public T validateIsDisabled(final AccordionUiElement element, final String value) {
236      Allure.step("[UI - Accordion] Validate that the accordion is disabled");
237      return validateAreEnabled(element, false, false, value);
238   }
239
240   /**
241    * Validates that the accordion element is disabled.
242    *
243    * @param element The accordion UI element.
244    * @param soft    A boolean indicating whether the validation should be performed softly.
245    *                If {@code true}, failures will be collected rather than throwing an exception immediately.
246    * @param value   The value to validate.
247    * @return The current fluent service instance for method chaining.
248    */
249   public T validateIsDisabled(final AccordionUiElement element, boolean soft, final String value) {
250      Allure.step("[UI - Accordion] Validate that the accordion is disabled (soft: " + soft + "): " + value);
251      return validateAreEnabled(element, false, soft, value);
252   }
253
254   /**
255    * Retrieves a list of currently expanded accordions for the given Accordion UI element.
256    *
257    * @param element The accordion UI element.
258    * @return The current fluent service instance for method chaining.
259    */
260   public T getExpanded(final AccordionUiElement element) {
261      Allure.step(String.format("[UI - Accordion] Retrieve a list of currently expanded accordions for "
262            + "componentType: %s", element.componentType()));
263      element.before().accept(driver);
264      List<String> expanded = accordionService.getExpanded(element.componentType(), element.locator());
265      element.after().accept(driver);
266      storage.sub(UI).put(element.enumImpl(), expanded);
267      return uiServiceFluent;
268   }
269
270   /**
271    * Validates that the specified accordion elements are expanded for the given Accordion UI element.
272    *
273    * @param element        The {@link AccordionUiElement} representing the Accordion UI component.
274    * @param expectedValues The expected values that should be expanded.
275    * @return The fluent UI service instance, allowing for method chaining.
276    */
277   public T validateExpandedItems(final AccordionUiElement element, final String... expectedValues) {
278      Allure.step("[UI - Accordion] Validate that the accordions are expanded");
279      return validateExpandedItems(element, false, expectedValues);
280   }
281
282   /**
283    * Validates that the specified accordion elements are expanded for the given Accordion UI element.
284    *
285    * @param element        The {@link AccordionUiElement} representing the Accordion UI component.
286    * @param soft           A boolean indicating whether the validation should be performed softly.
287    *                       If {@code true}, failures will be collected rather than throwing an exception immediately.
288    * @param expectedValues The expected values that should be expanded.
289    * @return The fluent UI service instance, allowing for method chaining.
290    */
291   public T validateExpandedItems(final AccordionUiElement element, boolean soft, final String... expectedValues) {
292      Allure.step("[UI - Accordion] Validate that the accordions are expanded (soft: " + soft + "): "
293            + Arrays.toString(expectedValues));
294      element.before().accept(driver);
295      List<String> expandedItems = accordionService.getExpanded(element.componentType(), element.locator());
296      element.after().accept(driver);
297      storage.sub(UI).put(element.enumImpl(), expandedItems);
298
299      if (soft) {
300         return (T) uiServiceFluent.validate(
301               softAssertions -> softAssertions.assertThat(expandedItems)
302                     .as(VALIDATING_ACCORDIONS)
303                     .containsAll(Arrays.asList(expectedValues))
304         );
305      } else {
306         return (T) uiServiceFluent.validate(
307               () -> Assertions.assertThat(expandedItems)
308                     .as(VALIDATING_ACCORDIONS)
309                     .containsAll(Arrays.asList(expectedValues))
310         );
311      }
312   }
313
314   /**
315    * Retrieves a list of currently collapsed accordions for the given Accordion UI element.
316    *
317    * @param element The accordion UI element.
318    * @return The current fluent service instance for method chaining.
319    */
320   public T getCollapsed(final AccordionUiElement element) {
321      Allure.step(String.format("[UI - Accordion] Retrieve a list of currently collapsed accordions for "
322            + "componentType: %s", element.componentType()));
323      element.before().accept(driver);
324      List<String> collapsed = accordionService.getCollapsed(element.componentType(), element.locator());
325      element.after().accept(driver);
326      storage.sub(UI).put(element.enumImpl(), collapsed);
327      return uiServiceFluent;
328   }
329
330   /**
331    * Validates that the specified accordion elements are collapsed for the given Accordion UI element.
332    *
333    * @param element        The {@link AccordionUiElement} representing the Accordion UI component.
334    * @param expectedValues The expected values that should be collapsed.
335    * @return The fluent UI service instance, allowing for method chaining.
336    */
337   public T validateCollapsedItems(final AccordionUiElement element, final String... expectedValues) {
338      Allure.step("[UI - Accordion] Validate that the accordions are collapsed");
339      return validateCollapsedItems(element, false, expectedValues);
340   }
341
342   /**
343    * Validates that the specified accordion elements are collapsed for the given Accordion UI element.
344    *
345    * @param element        The {@link AccordionUiElement} representing the Accordion UI component.
346    * @param soft           A boolean indicating whether the validation should be performed softly.
347    *                       If {@code true}, failures will be collected rather than throwing an exception immediately.
348    * @param expectedValues The expected values that should be collapsed.
349    * @return The fluent UI service instance, allowing for method chaining.
350    */
351   public T validateCollapsedItems(final AccordionUiElement element, boolean soft, final String... expectedValues) {
352      Allure.step("[UI - Accordion] Validate that the accordions are collapsed (soft: " + soft + "): "
353            + Arrays.toString(expectedValues));
354      element.before().accept(driver);
355      List<String> collapsedItems = accordionService.getCollapsed(element.componentType(), element.locator());
356      element.after().accept(driver);
357      storage.sub(UI).put(element.enumImpl(), collapsedItems);
358
359      if (soft) {
360         return (T) uiServiceFluent.validate(
361               softAssertions -> softAssertions.assertThat(collapsedItems)
362                     .as(VALIDATING_ACCORDIONS)
363                     .containsAll(Arrays.asList(expectedValues))
364         );
365      } else {
366         return (T) uiServiceFluent.validate(
367               () -> Assertions.assertThat(collapsedItems)
368                     .as(VALIDATING_ACCORDIONS)
369                     .containsAll(Arrays.asList(expectedValues))
370         );
371      }
372   }
373
374   /**
375    * Retrieves all available accordions.
376    *
377    * @param element The Accordion UI element.
378    * @return The fluent UI service instance, allowing for method chaining.
379    */
380   public T getAll(final AccordionUiElement element) {
381      Allure.step(String.format("[UI - Accordion] Retrieve all the accordions for componentType: %s",
382            element.componentType()));
383      element.before().accept(driver);
384      List<String> allAccordions = accordionService.getAll(element.componentType(), element.locator());
385      element.after().accept(driver);
386      storage.sub(UI).put(element.enumImpl(), allAccordions);
387      return uiServiceFluent;
388   }
389
390   /**
391    * Validates that all expected accordions are present for the given accordion UI element.
392    *
393    * @param element        The {@link AccordionUiElement} representing the Accordion UI component.
394    * @param expectedValues The expected values that should be present.
395    * @return The fluent UI service instance, allowing for method chaining.
396    */
397   public T validateAllAccordions(final AccordionUiElement element, final String... expectedValues) {
398      Allure.step("[UI - Accordion] Validate that all expected accordions are present");
399      return validateAllAccordions(element, false, expectedValues);
400   }
401
402   /**
403    * Validates that all expected accordions are present for the given accordion UI element.
404    *
405    * @param element        The {@link AccordionUiElement} representing the Accordion UI component.
406    * @param soft           A boolean indicating whether the validation should be performed softly.
407    *                       If {@code true}, failures will be collected rather than throwing an exception immediately.
408    * @param expectedValues The expected values that should be present.
409    * @return The fluent UI service instance, allowing for method chaining.
410    */
411   public T validateAllAccordions(final AccordionUiElement element, boolean soft, final String... expectedValues) {
412      Allure.step("[UI - Accordion] Validate that all expected accordions are present (soft: " + soft + "): "
413            + Arrays.toString(expectedValues));
414      element.before().accept(driver);
415      List<String> allItems = accordionService.getAll(element.componentType(), element.locator());
416      element.after().accept(driver);
417      storage.sub(UI).put(element.enumImpl(), allItems);
418
419      if (soft) {
420         return (T) uiServiceFluent.validate(
421               softAssertions -> softAssertions.assertThat(expectedValues)
422                     .as(VALIDATING_ACCORDIONS).containsAll(Arrays.asList(expectedValues))
423         );
424      } else {
425         return (T) uiServiceFluent.validate(
426               () -> Assertions.assertThat(expectedValues)
427                     .as(VALIDATING_ACCORDIONS).containsAll(Arrays.asList(expectedValues))
428         );
429      }
430   }

432   /**
433    * Retrieves the title of the specified accordion element.
434    *
435    * @param element The accordion UI element.
436    * @return The current fluent service instance for method chaining.
437    */
438   public T getTitle(final AccordionUiElement element) {
439      Allure.step(String.format("[UI - Accordion] Getting title for componentType: %s, locator: %s",
440            element.componentType(), element.locator()));
441      element.before().accept(driver);
442      String title = accordionService.getTitle(element.componentType(), element.locator());
443      element.after().accept(driver);
444      storage.sub(UI).put(element.enumImpl(), title);
445      return uiServiceFluent;
446   }
447
448   /**
449    * Validates the title of the specified accordion.
450    *
451    * @param element       The {@link AccordionUiElement} representing the accordion UI component.
452    * @param expectedValue The expected value of the accordion title.
453    * @return The fluent UI service instance, allowing for method chaining.
454    */
455   public T validateTitle(final AccordionUiElement element, final String expectedValue) {
456      Allure.step("[UI - Accordion] Validate accordion title has value: " + expectedValue);
457      return validateTitle(element, false, expectedValue);
458   }
459
460   /**
461    * Validates the title of the specified accordion.
462    *
463    * @param element       The {@link AccordionUiElement} representing the accordion UI component.
464    * @param soft          A boolean indicating whether the validation should be performed softly.
465    *                      If {@code true}, failures will be collected rather than throwing an exception immediately.
466    * @param expectedValue The expected value of the accordion title.
467    * @return The fluent UI service instance, allowing for method chaining.
468    */
469   public T validateTitle(final AccordionUiElement element, boolean soft, final String expectedValue) {
470      Allure.step("[UI - Accordion] Validate accordion title has value: " + expectedValue
471            + " (soft: " + soft + ")");
472      element.before().accept(driver);
473      String title = accordionService.getTitle(element.componentType(), element.locator());
474      element.after().accept(driver);
475      storage.sub(UI).put(element.enumImpl(), title);
476
477      if (soft) {
478         return (T) uiServiceFluent.validate(
479               softAssertions -> softAssertions.assertThat(title)
480                     .as(VALIDATING_ACCORDIONS).isEqualTo(expectedValue)
481         );
482      } else {
483         return (T) uiServiceFluent.validate(
484               () -> Assertions.assertThat(title)
485                     .as(VALIDATING_ACCORDIONS).isEqualTo(expectedValue)
486         );
487      }
488   }
489
490   /**
491    * Retrieves the text content of the specified accordion element.
492    *
493    * @param element The accordion UI element.
494    * @return The current fluent service instance for method chaining.+
495    */
496   public T getText(final AccordionUiElement element) {
497      Allure.step(String.format("[UI - Accordion] Getting text for componentType: %s, locator: %s",
498            element.componentType(), element.locator()));
499      element.before().accept(driver);
500      String text = accordionService.getText(element.componentType(), element.locator());
501      element.after().accept(driver);
502      storage.sub(UI).put(element.enumImpl(), text);
503      return uiServiceFluent;
504   }
505
506   /**
507    * Validates the content for the specified accordion.
508    *
509    * @param element       The {@link AccordionUiElement} representing the accordion UI component.
510    * @param expectedValue The expected content for the specified accordion.
511    * @return The fluent UI service instance, allowing for method chaining.
512    */
513   public T validateText(final AccordionUiElement element, final String expectedValue) {
514      Allure.step("[UI - Accordion] Validate text content of the accordion with type: " + element.componentType());
515      return validateText(element, false, expectedValue);
516   }
517
518   /**
519    * Validates the text content for the specified accordion.
520    *
521    * @param element         The {@link AccordionUiElement} representing the accordion UI component.
522    * @param soft            A boolean indicating whether the validation should be performed softly.
523    *                        If {@code true}, failures will be collected rather than throwing an exception immediately.
524    * @param expectedContent The expected text content for the specified accordion.
525    * @return The fluent UI service instance, allowing for method chaining.
526    */
527   public T validateText(final AccordionUiElement element, boolean soft, final String expectedContent) {
528      Allure.step("[UI - Accordion] Validate text content of the accordion with type: " + element.componentType()
529            + " (soft: " + soft + ")");
530      element.before().accept(driver);
531      String textContent = accordionService.getText(element.componentType(), element.locator());
532      element.after().accept(driver);
533      storage.sub(UI).put(element.enumImpl(), textContent);
534
535      if (soft) {
536         return (T) uiServiceFluent.validate(
537               softAssertions -> softAssertions.assertThat(textContent)
538                     .as(VALIDATING_ACCORDIONS).isEqualTo(expectedContent)
539         );
540      } else {
541         return (T) uiServiceFluent.validate(
542               () -> Assertions.assertThat(textContent)
543                     .as(VALIDATING_ACCORDIONS).isEqualTo(expectedContent)
544         );
545      }
546   }
547}
